headline: Litigation Funding Overhaul In The UK: CJC's Final Report Explained
summary: A clear path forward for reform of litigation funding in the UK has now been formalised in the Civil Justice Council's final report, published on 2 June 2025. A suite of 58 recommendations sets out...
